dct_title_s: [Set of maps of Palestine, Mount Sinai, and Arabia Petraea]
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially and by hachures.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "Geographical miles", "Feet", "Engl. feet", "Roman miles".
Shows topography, drainage, roads, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Map [6] has 3 inset maps: Region between Cairo and Suez -- Plan of Petra from Laborde -- Pass of 'Akabah.
